movie.title: Snowden
movie.description_intro: SNOWDEN stars Joseph Gordon-Levitt and is written and directed by Oliver Stone. The script is based on the books The Snowden Files: The Inside Story of the World's Most Wanted Man by Luke Harding and Time of the Octopus by Anatoly Kucherena.
movie.description_full: SNOWDEN stars Joseph Gordon-Levitt and is written and directed by Oliver Stone. The script is based on the books The Snowden Files: The Inside Story of the World's Most Wanted Man by Luke Harding and Time of the Octopus by Anatoly Kucherena.

movies.title: Cover Me
movies.summary: Mia Stone is faced with an eerie supernatural opportunity when a strange encounter with an eccentric man gives her a second chance at saving her company, marriage, family, and future.
movies.description_full: Mia Stone is faced with an eerie supernatural opportunity when a strange encounter with an eccentric man gives her a second chance at saving her company, marriage, family, and future.
movies.synopsis: Mia Stone is faced with an eerie supernatural opportunity when a strange encounter with an eccentric man gives her a second chance at saving her company, marriage, family, and future.

movies.title: Suspect
movies.summary: A judge commits suicide, and his secretary is found murdered. A homeless deaf-mute man, Carl Anderson is arrested for her murder. Public defender Kathleen is assigned by the court as his lawyer. She sets to find the real killer, and gets help from the congressional advisor, Eddie Sanger who is called to be on the jury panel. Together they discover a dangerous circle of corruption in high places.
movies.description_full: A judge commits suicide, and his secretary is found murdered. A homeless deaf-mute man, Carl Anderson is arrested for her murder. Public defender Kathleen is assigned by the court as his lawyer. She sets to find the real killer, and gets help from the congressional advisor, Eddie Sanger who is called to be on the jury panel. Together they discover a dangerous circle of corruption in high places.

movies.title: Fallo!
movies.summary: 1) "Alibi" ("Alibi") While celebrating the seventh anniversary of marriage in a hotel in Casablanca, Morocco, Gianni convinces his wife Gianni to do a threesome with the room servant Ali. 2) "Double Trouble" ("Dupla Confusão") While playing tennis with Bruno, Stefania has intercourse with him in the bathroom. Meanwhile, Bruno's wife Erika does with Stefania's husband Luigi in his office, to get the position of guest in a talk show. 3) "Two Hearts and a Hut" ("Dois Corações e Uma Cabana") Hotel maid Katarina who wants to open their own hotel with her fiance Ciro is tipped with a high amount and prostitutes with a German couple of sadistic and masochistic. 4) "Jolly Bangs" ("Casos") While on the beach, Raffaella tells her husband Ugo her erotic affairs with other people for his satisfaction. 5) "Honni Soit Qui Mal y Pense" ("May Evil Be with him Who Thinks Evil") The photographer Franco wishes to have anal sex with Anna, who tells him that he can do only after marrying her. movies.title: Only Mine
movies.summary: Tormented and left for dead by a scorned lover, a woman finds the strength within herself to recover and retaliate against her abuser.
movies.description_full: Tormented and left for dead by a scorned lover, a woman finds the strength within herself to recover and retaliate against her abuser.
